summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Pike Place, or in An Easement on the Private Property Abutting Thereon, from Pike Street to a corporation with the existing wall on the easterly margin of Western Avenue; by constructing a retaining wall, all in accordance with Resolution No. 11961 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
